flow.name: db:/users/count

db:select.db:parameterized-query: SELECT r.name as name, COUNT(DISTINCT (u.uid)) as count, u.status FROM users u LEFT JOIN users_roles ur ON ur.uid = u.uid JOIN role r ON r.rid = ur.rid WHERE FROM_UNIXTIME(u.access)>= #[flowVars.from] And FROM_UNIXTIME(u.access)<= #[flowVars.until] GROUP BY ur.rid ORDER BY ur.rid DESC;
